overview.en: The Genaro Network is the first Turing-complete public blockchain combining peer-to-peer storage with a sustainable consensus mechanism. Genaro's mixed consensus uses SPoR and PoS, ensuring stronger performance and security.
overview.zh: Genaro Network 是首个结合去中心化存储网络的图灵完备公有链，它为区块链开发人员提供了一站式解决方案，在部署智慧合约的同时，可以存储用户资料。
